lyrics:
6 contributorsten times crazier lyricsverse 1
well im crazy about fast cars football and guitars
all them old country songs daddy used to play
im crazy about friday nights cold beer and good times
crazy about a summer day out on the lake

chorus
but im ten times crazier without about your love girl
id do about anything you ask me to
im just plain crazy about a lot of things baby
but im ten times crazier about you

verse 2
well im all about a weekend kicking with my good friends
every now and then i like to make a little noise
but dont you go thinking that i wont leave them hanging
cause even though im crazy about them good old boys

chorus
im ten times crazier about your loving girl
id do about anything you ask me to
im just plain crazy about a lot of things baby
but im ten times crazier about you

bridge
i know you love me girl thats easy to see
but as crazy as you say you are about me
see blake shelton liveget tickets as low as 49you might also likechorus
im ten times crazier about your loving girl
id do about anything you ask me to
im just plain crazy about a lot of things baby
but im ten times crazier about you

im ten times crazier about your loving girl
id do about anything you ask me to
im just plain crazy about a lot of things baby
but im ten times crazier about youembed
